entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming sunny late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
